name: RainRunner
description:
Antonia is a hero. This ant goes out while it is raining to bring important messages to all the other ants in the colony.

As you see it is a alpha. But I think i the next days this will become a playable game.

Engine: Godot

The drawn picture of Antonia is a 5 minute artwork by tattoo-artist foa-k. Visit her on https://foa-k-tattoo.de
